title: Assignments/Shifts for Durham PD and HEART personnel (Durham Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the North Carolina Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Records detailing assignments and shifts for 911 dispatchers, Durham Police Department personnel, and HEART staff (including social workers, EMTs, and other relevant personnel on CCD, CRT, and COR teams).

Specifically, I request the following information for the period of January 1, 2021 to most recent date data is captured:

911 Dispatch/Emergency Communications Personnel
For each dispatcher on duty:

Identifying Information:
First, middle, and last name
Date of birth
Appointment date
Race and gender
Rank if appropriate

Shift Assignments:
Dates, start and end times of each shift

--

Police Department Personnel
For each officer on duty:

Identifying Information:
First, middle, and last name
Date of birth
Appointment date
Race and gender
Rank

Shift Assignments:
Dates, start and end times of each shift
Assigned beat or district

Activity Details:
Locations or areas of deployment
Any records related to their interactions with the HEART program

--

HEART Program Personnel
For HEART personnel (including social workers, EMTs, and other relevant personnel on CCD, CRT, and COR teams):

Identifying Information:
First, middle, and last name
Whether personnel were part of a specific response team (e.g., Co-Response Team (COR), Crisis Response Team (CRT))
Role (e.g., social worker, EMT, etc.)

Shift Assignments:
Dates, start and end times of each shift
Assigned beat or district

Activity Details:
Logs or records indicating which calls they were assigned to

--

If you determine that portions of the requested records are exempt from disclosure, I ask that you release any segregable portions of the records.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

bocar ba
